content: I'm looking for some resources on creating a more inclusive workplace environment. I just got back from a workshop on gender equality and was surprised by the stats on the gender ratio and leadership positions in my company. By the way, I had a conversation with my friend Rachel, who's non-binary, about their experience of feeling marginalized in the LGBTQ+ community, and it really opened my eyes to the importance of using gender-neutral language and respecting people's preferred pronouns.
